awards.text: Nominated for 2 Oscars. Another 4 wins & 10 nominations.

fullplot: Anna Mae Bullock always had a special voice. Soon after arriving in St. Louis to live with the mother who had walked out when she was small, the now teenage Anna Mae soon attracts the attention of pop group leader Ike Turner. She becomes the band's singer, his wife, and mother to his children - not all hers. In love with Ike and determined not to leave in the way her mother had, she finds herself the target of increasing violence from her unstable husband who can't see who is making the band such a success.
plot: The story of singer Tina Turner's rise to stardom and how she gained the courage to break free from abusive husband, Ike Turner.
title: What's Love Got to Do with It

tomatoes.consensus: With a fascinating real-life story and powerhouse performances from Angela Bassett and Laurence Fishburne, What's Love Got to Do With It? is a can't miss biopic.
